amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Public Broadcasting Facilities and Construction by $2 million, and to decrease by a commensurate amount funding for the Bureau of the Census to carry out periodic censuses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to increase funding for Public Broadcasting Facilities and Construction by $2 million, and to decrease by a commensurate amount funding for the Bureau of the Census to carry out periodic censuses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 234 (Roll no. 581).
